metadata.title: CVE-2015-0838 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Buffer overflow in the C implementation of the apply_delta function in_pack.c in Dulwich before 0.9.9 allows remote attackers to executearbitrary code via a crafted pack file.

criterions.comment: dulwich: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
